Chamaleon::

Chamaleon was doing all things that Darkfate had commanded him, after 
close the Black Fortress he sent the menssage that Darkfate had given 
him, just Killfest and Drillbit could read it.

Menssage said:

Black Fortress will be close a while, nobody could leave or come in 
in some minutes; Lava will recharge our base's energy. Nobody of our 
troops were around and the cave won't have access in a while.

Also Alliance is interesting to get a Ally-deal, I'll try to find out 
what zardus knows  about our alli and try to win time. I think that 
we have to speak about this.

C. Darkfate.
